author: Gus_263
title: Good for a small set, a so much small set.
review: This is one of the small sets of the castle theme, black knights subtheme. Same set as 1917, the "Stone Bomber" was released in 1998 and was packaged with Kabaya sweets, so, it is a promo set, and includes few pieces. The minifigure included is a black knight, simple designed but nice, because it still in a simple lego minifigure style, and have a cool color scheme, with some red, yellow and black details, also includes a helmet and a sword. The catapult is so simple, builted above a green small plate, and made with some black and gray blocks on each side, increased with two axes, and these have in the center a long plate, the part of the catapult that launchs the stones, small blocks in circular shapes. The catapult, altough basic, works well, but with a simple playability. This set is a small promotional set, good in comparison with the size, one more small to increase more castle sets. This must have a comparison with other promotional sets with the same size, so, it is a 5/5.
